scripts.build-bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.build-bundle-android-dev: react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.build-bundle-ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ios/main.map
scripts.build-bundle-ios-dev: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev true --entry-file index.ios.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --sourcemap-output ios/main.map
scripts.build-deployment: npm run build-relay && npm run build-server && npm run build-webpack
scripts.build-server: export NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf deployment/* && rsync -avm --exclude='*.js' --exclude='*.jsx' units ./deployment/ && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/units/ ./units && cp ./package.json ./deployment && cp ./yarn.lock ./deployment
scripts.build-server-old: export NODE_ENV=production && rm -rf deployment/* && cp -r ./units/_configuration ./deployment/units && ./node_modules/.bin/babel -s true --retain-lines -d ./deployment/units/ ./units && rsync -avm --include='*.ejs' --include='*.json' -f 'hide,! */' units ./deployment/ && rsync -avm --include='*.graphql.js' -f 'hide,! */' units ./deployment/ && cp ./package.json ./deployment && cp ./yarn.lock ./deployment
scripts.dev: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev-relay" "npm run dev-webpack" "npm run dev-server"
scripts.dev-app: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev-relay" "npm run dev-webpack" "npm run dev-server" "npm run start"
scripts.dev-reset: sudo chmod -R a+w * && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && rm -f ./ios/main.* && rm -f ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.* && watchman watch-del-all &&  rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf ~/.node-gyp  && (cd units && find . -type d -name '__generated__' | xargs rm -r)
scripts.setup-local: cp ./units/_configuration/default.env ./.env && cp ./units/_configuration/urb-base-app/default.publicURL.js ./units/_configuration/urb-base-app/publicURL.js && npm run update-ip && react-native link
